data.title: Home of the TCTV awards and much more!
data.text: Weddings for a reasonable price, and home of the TCTV awards, where I was producer of the year 4x in a row and producer of 216 cable ACCESS shows. Nice locale, great parking, near the Torrance Library, and Japanese Garden.

data.title: The Torrance Cultural Arts Center
data.text: This is an excellent place to visit in Torrance. Besides an excellent library, there are paintings and sculptures on display and a good Auditorium

data.title: interesting cultural activities
data.text: I have either participated in or been a guest at several of the annual Japanese Bunkasai festivals there. Once I won the raffle even, a family trip to the Elephant Bar. In 2012 they had a piano there for a month outside as part of an international event, and I remember playing that piano at the time and appreciated that Torrance has interesting cultural activities

owner_response.author: Jordan R, Manager at Torrance Cultural Arts Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for your kind words.  For future events, you can also check out www.TorranceCA.gov/events for other happenings around the City of Torrance.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: No place like it!
data.text:
In the center the entreatment is unbelievable , for example there are different, ballet, Comedy, musical,
needless to say one can spend an entire day just
simply walking the grounds.so much also, for children
huge swimming pool ,lesson , they have a vase program of different classes, such as piano, ballet,
languages, Spanish, ESL, Japanese, art,

owner_response.author: Jordan R, Manager at Torrance Cultural Arts Center, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hidden Gem
data.text: The community space is a hidden gem.  There is a theater, performance space, large meeting rooms, one with a stage, two commercial kitchens, classrooms, a tiny Japanese Garden, and outside courtyard.  It is well-maintained and used by Parks and Rec classes, for wedding receptions, cultural arts programs, plays, etc.

data.title: What would we do without the Torrance Cultural Arts Center?
data.text:
Being a long time resident of the South Bay I can say that I've been using the facilities for over 20 years.  The hula show is a big hit every year and my nephews play in a band that plays here.  Friends have been married here in the Japanese Garden.  

What makes it great are the people.  Every time I start a new class, a staff member greets me with a smile ready to guide students to their classes.  I take a fitness class here and have tried several over the last decade.  The prices are excellent and my current instructor is the best yet!  Terri teaches a boot camp style Step and Circuit class that is probably the most challenging I've ever taken, and I've tried many over my lifetime.  She is low impact but high results.  I feel stronger than I've ever felt in my life.  I owe it all to Torrance Cultural Arts Center and Terri!

data.title: Very good venue
data.text: This is a lovely local theatre offering a good range of productions. I don't think there's a bad seat in the house. Only quibble is that the entry to each row is slanted very strangely and can be difficult, especially for people with mobility issues.

data.title: Great variety of entertainment
data.text: The Arts Committee schedules some great shows and the wide selection keeps it interesting. Parking can be tight.

data.title: Girls. Night Out
data.text: Wonderful venue. A reasonably priced entertainment option for the beach area. You can sit anywhere in the Armstrong Theater and have a good seat. Plenty of parking at no cost. A full bar is offered and we had a chance to meet the stars of the show after.

data.title: Center of the City
data.text: There is always something going on here. They hold classes for adults and kids. They host numerous event (Craft Faires, Cultural Programs). They also have a great theater where you can see wonderful plays, musicians etc year round.

data.title: MANY different kinds of events!
data.text: The Torrance Cultural Arts Center has all kinds of events, from theater to concerts to multi-cultural events. There is, also, a lovely garden that is perfect for quiet contemplation or talks.

data.title: A nice place to go visit as well as see a concert
data.text: This place is indeed a nice concert venue to go see a concert as well as take in other things that go on there. So if you want a nice place to go and see some great programs and see a nice venue for concerts. Go to this place it is really overall very nice.

data.title: Perfect small venue
data.text:
Excellent, relatively intimate concert facility.  

Good parking.

Signage a tad confusing from the street actually finding the theatre.  A tad dark walking around there at night.

data.title: Welcoming and informative
data.text: Although its not open standard hours we were able to walk thru the charming parts of old Torrence then meet with the museum folks who answered all our questions. They were so thrilled at our level of interest!  Very enjoyable

data.title: Beautifully Kept Grounds
data.text: I went to a seminar/expo and walked around the grounds.  They are beautifully kept and peaceful.  It looks like it would be a great place to hold an event like a wedding.

data.title: Economical classes
data.text: I used to take my kids there for piano lessons, ballet class, and art class. The classes were very affordable but registering for the classes were a pain. If you don't log on at 8am the day registration starts, the class you want might not be there anymore. Sometimes even when you log in as soon as registration opens the classes are already full. In terms of tourist visiting there really isn't anything to see. They have a small garden that is nice but it's so small you can see it in one glance.

data.title: Local Talent Shows Off
data.text: Wonderful city cultural center.  Lot of talented people exhibiting their art work.  Very encouraging place for those so inclined with artistic talent.  Happens not to be me, but I can still enjoy the exhibits.

data.title: Great center for art and other cultural events
data.text: Have taken several art and dance classes at this location.  It is close to the civic library as well, which makes it so convenient.  It has some great shows, performances and cultural festivals and it is a beautiful spot

data.title: Small but packs a punch!
data.text: This is a very nicely appointed art gallery. something for everyone! Enjoy!

data.title: Always have fun family events and Great Classes
data.text: I've been taking a Polynesian class here for the past 4 years and it's been great. I've taken other classes here before, as well. they have a great offering each season for everyone and for all ages.
